posts.post_content:
Hi

I have a fair amount of Dahlen Boston versions that I'd consider moving. Below is a link to my Flickr album. If you see one you are interested in shoot me a PM and I can give you a number. 

Only the Piedmont & Sweet Caps are available. The off backs are not outside of the Sov 150 SGC 1.5. I'd be willing to sell that one. 

PSA 4 cert #41087154 has been sold.

Thanks.

Scott

[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/171415994@N04/albums/72177720312275846/with/53324800307[/url]
Interested in any of the lower grade Sov 150. Please let me know pricing. Thanks!

Sent PM


Geoff Bedine
Premier Card Collectors
Since 1977

Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

PM sent

Aaron


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Wow! That is a ton of Dahlens 😀

[quote name="stutor" post=2527790]Wow! That is a ton of Dahlens 😀[/QUOTE]

Yeah, I chuckled at “quite a few”.
It used to be an obsession when the getting was good. I think I drove up the price on myself and they got too expensive lol!

Sold a number. Still a bunch left. Shoot me a note if you are interested in one. A few are marked sold but I haven't deleted them yet. I want to wait until they arrive to the buyer.

***No offbacks FS***

Thanks.

Scott

Hey Scott

Sent a couple of PMs.

Thanks

Geoff
